idea: Businesses and Auditors Need Trustworthy Financials.: Business owners need to trust the financials they report back to their investors and auditors, so professionals must provide all financial transactions that are performed through the company. We have created a solution for that by automating financial balance confirmation to ensure every transaction is accounted for, and producing an audit road map for auditors to easily track when accounts were last balanced. Our solution comes with the power of blockchain technology, hence ensuring absolute trust in the information entered
name: AUDIT CIRCLE BALANCE CONFIRMATIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Trip Store Holidays is a Online Tour Marketplace connecting Travellers and Tour Operators to choose the best Group Tours, Fixed Departures and Multi Day Tours from around the world with over 20 Travel themes like Solo, Women Only, Motorcycle, Trekking, Religious, Cruise, Honeymoon etc. We offer over 1000+ Tours operated by 100+ World Class tour operators with over 400 successful bookings thru our platform since December 2020. No other platform offers so many options under one roof for such a large array of tours styles and destinations.
name: TRIP STORE HOLIDAYS LLP

idea: Supplying essential medical products in a fast and easy manner. idea:
Sacred Forest is an initiative by a team of doctors and a mother to encourage people to choose a healthier lifestyle by providing them with interesting alternatives. 


it often is difficult to choose healthier alternatives due to their lower appetizing values. Sacred Forest helps to bridge this gap.


We bring you products that are not just healthy and nourishing but are also a treat for your tastebuds. Sacred Forest aims to bring to you a better lifestyle, without really changing yours
name: Sacred Forest
